# pybrsa API Reference

## Core Data Fetching

### \`list_tables()\`
\`\`\`{python}
#| eval: false
import pybrsa

# List available data tables
tables = pybrsa.list_tables(source="bddk", lang="en")
print(f"Available tables: {len(tables)}")
\`\`\`

### \`fetch_bddk()\`
\`\`\`{python}
#| eval: false
# Fetch Monthly Bulletin data
data = pybrsa.fetch_bddk(
    start_year=2020,
    start_month=1,
    end_year=2020,
    end_month=12,
    table_no=4,
    grup_kod=10001
)
\`\`\`

### \`fetch_finturk()\`
\`\`\`{python}
#| eval: false
# Fetch granular provincial data
province_data = pybrsa.fetch_finturk(
    start_year=2024,
    start_month=1,
    end_year=2024,
    end_month=1,
    table_no=2,
    grup_kod=10001,
    il=0  # All provinces
)
\`\`\`

## Utility Functions

### \`save_data()\`
\`\`\`{python}
#| eval: false
import pybrsa

data = pybrsa.fetch_bddk(...)
# Save to different formats
pybrsa.save_data(data, "my_data", format="csv")
pybrsa.save_data(data, "my_data", format="pkl")  # Python's .rds
pybrsa.save_data(data, "my_data", format="xlsx")
\`\`\`

### \`tempfile_base()\`
\`\`\`{python}
#| eval: false
# Create temporary file path
temp_path = pybrsa.tempfile_base()
print(f"Temporary path: {temp_path}")
\`\`\`
